versions.name: Suspicious Powershell Script v101.0.0
versions.description: A machine learning job detected a PowerShell script with unusual data characteristics, such as obfuscation, that may be a characteristic of malicious PowerShell script text blocks.
author: Elastic
false_positives: Certain kinds of security testing may trigger this alert. PowerShell scripts that use high levels of obfuscation or have unusual script block payloads may trigger this alert.
